item.title: What's in the numbers: A look at the Lusaka Securities Exchange
item.author: simumbaaaron20@gmail.com (Aaron Simumba)
item.description: In the next coming few weeks, I plan to do a series of posts specifically targeted at the Lusaka Securities Exchange (LuSE). Essentially, this idea came to mind after reading through this Bloomberg Markets article, which highlights historical equity market returns .
